name: City Gangster Boss Sim
description:
City Gangster Boss Sim which has everything of crime city that’s makes you a gangster in the fantasy and action games world where you have to complete the sick targets to kill the horrible fighters generating horrible gang wars and earn bigger bucks than you have ever imagined!
Features
• Best miami crime game with lots of missions in real miami city streets.
• Real firing ammunition, epic battle and cops evading.
• Action & RPG based gang war, fights and attack missions.
• Third person shooting experience, real kicks and punches animations.
• Amazing attack animations with advanced combat features
